sentences.english: More very similar scrapers will be needed very shortly after this job.
sentences.chinese: 更有什類似鏟運機將需要很後不久，這個工作。

sentences.english: The maturing of variable frequency technology becomes an assurance for the reliable operation of a trolley type scraper.
sentences.chinese: 變頻調速技術的成熟是滑線式鏟運機可靠工作的保證。

sentences.english: Diesel driven LHD units are highly efficient ore hauling equipment in underground mining operations.
sentences.chinese: 柴油鏟運機是地下采礦作業中的高效運礦設備。

sentences.english: Moreover, the paper offers opinion about how to develop hydraulic system of scraper.
sentences.chinese: 並對今後鏟運機液壓系統如何發展談了看法。
